confDetailedDescription.extendedHelp: The conf command allows you to quickly change your per-server settings, as an alternative to individual commands.

confGet: The value for the key **{{key}}** is: `{{value}}`
confGetNoExt: The key **{{key}}** does not seem to exist.
confMenuInvalidAction: Invalid Action, please try again with any of the following setting keys.
confMenuInvalidKey: Invalid Key, please try again with any of the following setting keys.
confMenuNoChange: The value for **{{key}}** was already set as that value.
confMenuRenderBack: Press on the ‚óÄ to go back
confMenuRenderNokeys: There are no settings keys for this folder.
confMenuRenderSelect: Please send any of the following setting keys.
confMenuSaved: {{SUCCESS}} I saved all of your changes.
confMissingValue: The value for **{{key}}** was never set.
confReset: {{SUCCESS}} The key **{{key}}** has been reset to: `{{value}}`
confValidationChooseKey: {{ERROR}} You can't configure a group, please choose one of the following keys: {{keys, and}}.
evalDescription: Allows you evaluate JavaScript code straight from Discord.

evalDetailedDescription.extendedHelp:
The eval command evaluates code as-in, any error thrown from it will be handled.
It also uses the flags feature. Write `--silent`, `--depth=number`, `--output=console/haste`, `--message` or `--async` to customize the output.

‚Ä¢ The --silent flag will make it output nothing.
‚Ä¢ The --depth flag accepts a number, for example, --depth=2, to customize util.inspect's depth.
‚Ä¢ The --async flag will wrap the code into an async function where you can enjoy the use of await, however, if you want to return something, you will need the return keyword.
‚Ä¢ The `--message` flag will output the result in a message instead of a codeblock.
‚Ä¢ The `--showHidden` flag will enable the showHidden option in util.inspect.
‚Ä¢ The `--output=` option can be used to specify where to output the result `console` or `paste`.

By default if the output is too large, it'll send the output to paste.

reloadDetailedDescription.extendedHelp: Reload a piece of mine, or an i18n language.
explainedUsage: The piece or language to reload, or "everything" to reload everything.

serverlistDescription: Show a list of my servers.
serverlistDetailedDescription: Displays every guild the bot is currently in, along with their id and membercount.
